columns.description: Pitcher full name as displayed in Statcast exports.
columns.name: player_name

columns.description: MLBAM pitcher identifier.
columns.name: player_id

columns.description: Season year tied to the stat line.
columns.name: year

columns.description: Internal Baseball Savant season key (mirrors year).
columns.name: yearhidden

columns.description: Seasonal age for the pitcher (age on June 30).
columns.name: player_age

columns.description: At-bats faced (AB).
columns.name: ab

columns.description: Plate appearances faced.
columns.name: pa

columns.description: Hits allowed (1B + 2B + 3B + HR).
columns.name: hit

columns.description: Singles allowed.
columns.name: single

columns.description: Doubles allowed.
columns.name: double

columns.description: Triples allowed.
columns.name: triple

columns.description: Home runs allowed.
columns.name: home_run

columns.description: Strikeouts recorded.
columns.name: strikeout

columns.description: Walks issued (BB).
columns.name: walk

columns.description: Strikeout percentage (K% = strikeouts / PA).
columns.name: k_percent

columns.description: Walk percentage (BB% = walks / PA).
columns.name: bb_percent

columns.description: Opponent batting average (hits / at-bats).
columns.name: batting_avg

columns.description: Opponent slugging percentage.
columns.name: slg_percent

columns.description: Opponent on-base percentage.
columns.name: on_base_percent

columns.description: Opponent OPS (OBP + SLG).
columns.name: on_base_plus_slg

columns.description: Opponent isolated power (ISO).
columns.name: isolated_power

columns.description: Opponent BABIP (batting average on balls in play).
columns.name: babip

columns.description: Expected batting average derived from exit velo + launch angle.
columns.name: xba

columns.description: Expected slugging percentage from Statcast contact quality.
columns.name: xslg

columns.description: Weighted on-base average (wOBA).
columns.name: woba

columns.description: Expected wOBA from Statcast.
columns.name: xwoba

columns.description: Expected on-base percentage.
columns.name: xobp

columns.description: Expected isolated power.
columns.name: xiso

columns.description: wOBA on contact (balls put in play only).
columns.name: wobacon

columns.description: Expected wOBA on contact.
columns.name: xwobacon

columns.description: Batting average on contact (hits / balls in play).
columns.name: bacon

columns.description: Expected batting average on contact.
columns.name: xbacon

columns.description: Expected BA minus actual BA.
columns.name: xbadiff

columns.description: Expected SLG minus actual SLG.
columns.name: xslgdiff

columns.description: Expected wOBA minus actual wOBA.
columns.name: wobadiff

columns.description: Average opponent exit velocity on contact (mph).
columns.name: exit_velocity_avg

columns.description: Average opponent launch angle in degrees.
columns.name: launch_angle_avg

columns.description: Share of opponent batted balls hit in the 8°-32° “sweet spot.”
columns.name: sweet_spot_percent

columns.description: Number of barrels allowed.
columns.name: barrel

columns.description: Percent of opponent batted balls that were barrels.

columns.description: Share of opponent contact classified as solid.

columns.description: Share of flares/burners allowed.
columns.name: flareburner_percent

columns.name: poorlyunder_percent

columns.description: Share of opponent contact that was topped.
columns.name: poorlytopped_percent

columns.description: Share of weak contact allowed.
columns.name: poorlyweak_percent

columns.description: Percentage of opponent batted balls hit 95+ mph.

columns.name: avg_best_speed

columns.description: Average high-end (“hyper”) exit velocity allowed.
columns.name: avg_hyper_speed
